Article.ArticleTitle: Letter to the Editor Regarding Fleischer et al. Neurological Study Does Not Provide Any Evidence that Long COVID is Psychosomatic.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Independent Researcher, Amsterdam, The Netherlands. markvink.md@outlook.com.
Institute of Precision Medicine, Furtwangen University, Furtwangen im Schwarzwald, Germany.

Reference.Citation: Fleischer M, Szepanowski F, Tovar M, et al. Post-COVID-19 Syndrome is Rarely Associated with Damage of the Nervous System: Findings from a Prospective Observational Cohort Study in 171 Patients. Neurol Ther. 2022;11:1637–1657. doi: 10.1007/s40120-022-00395-z.
